lines.gurmukhi: igAwn iDAwn pRwn suq rwKq jnnI pRiq Avgun gun mwqw icq mY n cyq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Giaan Dhiaan Praan Sout Raakhat Jananee Prati , Avagoun Goun Maataa Chit Mai N Chayt Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a son leaves his understanding, perception and protection of his life in the care of his mother, and she too does not think of her son's merits and demerits.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Brqwir Bwir nwir aur hwir mwnY qw qy lwlu llnw ko mwnu min lyq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Bharataari Bhaari Naari Ur Haari Maanai , Taa Tay Laalu Lalanaa Ko Maanu Mani Layt Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a wife filled with love of her husband, bears all the load of her husband on her mind, the husband too makes loving and respectful room for her in his heart.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ctIAw sBIq skucq pwDw pyiK qw qy BUil cUik pwDw Cwfq n hyq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Chateeaa Sabheet Sakouchat Paadhaa Paykhi , Taa Tay Bhooli Chooki Paadhaa Chhaadat N Hayt Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a student feels petrified at the sight of the teacher and as a reaction, the teacher too ignores his mistakes under the influence of this reverential fear and does not give up loving him.

lines.gurmukhi: mn bc kRm gur crn srin isiK qw qy siqgur jmdUqih n dyq hY ]358]
lines.transliteration_english: Man Bach Kram Gur Charan Sarani Sikhi , Taa Tay Satigur Jamadootahi N Dayt Hai ?358?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, a Sikh of the Guru who takes the refuge of the True Guru with devotion and love in his heart, the True Guru does not let him fall in the hands of angels of death when he is about to leave for the world beyond. The True Guru provides him a place
